de.unlixx.runpng.png

Class PngProject

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unlixx.runpng.png.PngProject

  • public class PngProject
extends java.lang.Object
    Container class for a png project. Because an animated png file stores only the final result of the creation, a png project gathers all components and settings in use to store them in one zipped file. This makes it possible to do changes later if needed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PngProject

        public PngProject()
        Constructor for a png project to save. It creates a meta data document of type Document which contains it's own file description first. The application name and version will be stored in this document as well.

      • PngProject

        PngProject(org.w3c.dom.Document document)
        Package private constructor for a png project in read.
        Parameters:
        document - A Document object. Or null if not yet known.

      • addFileDescription

        public void addFileDescription(java.lang.String strType,
                               java.lang.String strUsage,
                               java.lang.String strName,
                               java.lang.Integer index,
                               java.lang.String strComment)
        Adds a file description to the meta document.
        Parameters:
        strType - A string containing the type (xml, png, ...).
        strUsage - A string describing the usage (meta, sequence, ...).
        strName - A string with the storage filename.
        index - An index or null if not needed.
        strComment - An optional comment or null.
